title: 86/345/EEC: Council Decision of 24 July 1986 authorizing the extension or tacit renewal of certain trade agreements concluded between the Portuguese Republic and third countries
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 24 July 1986
authorizing the extension or tacit renewal of certain trade agreements concluded between the Portuguese Republic and third countries
(86/345/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Trade Agreements and Protocols between the Portuguese Republic and third countries, as listed in the Annex hereto, may be extended or tacitly renewed up to the dates indicated for each of them for those areas not covered by Agreements between the Community and the third countries concerned and in so far as their provisions are not contrary to existing common policies.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
